title: Champion Chemistry - Champion Selecting
body: In ranked games, how do you know which to select of your champions (considering only ones you are experienced with) in consideration with the rest of team, yes I know tanks are important for all team comps (although often teams are left without tanks which usually causes for their dis-advantage). If you are last pick and you so far have a team that is poke heavy OR situation 2 you have a team that is good at teamfights, what do you go for in each situation, a more of a poke champion or a team-fight based champion? Do you need a diverse team with pokers, teamfighters, ect. or is it best to  have a team that specializes in one or the other? I'd appreciate anything that gets me closer to my answer..
